title: Joining The Champ Select Late
body:
Recently whenever I accept a game, the screen either turns black (expect for the social tab) or the screen just dims out a little and then about 15 seconds later I join the champ select. I don't know why its doing this, I have good wifi and good connection but it just keeps joining late. Its very stressful dealing with this because i cant even call my role and Iv'e been having to play support :(
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: This also has been happening to me recently! It's quite annoying {{item:3070}}

For me, this problem started occurring with the latest patch, 7.4. Every single time i que up and in all ques. My blackout lasts for at least 40 seconds which jeopardize ban phase in draft and makes it hard to trade, reroll and set up sums, mastries and runes in ARURF. Initiated a Full Repair in the client but it didn't help. 

Would appreciate a fix for this ultra rapidly.

EDIT:

Did some googling and found another post on the board. This gave me some kind of a workaround though it's still problematic:

[Friend-list causing freeze in champ-select](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ZiBGWUjA-client-bugs-and-is-late-joining-champ-select-unless-my-friends-list-is-collapsed?show=rundown)

This blackout doesn't occur if my friend-groups in the friend-list are all collapsed. The remaining problem is that after a game these friend-group-lists automaticly expand. Collapsing them all takes me about two minutes since there is a minor freeze for each one. At least this way i wont suffer from que-dodge-penalties.

It actually, fortunately, stopped happening to me, not after the reinstall if you read below, all the reinstall did was make me press "launch" even though i have League Alpha Client. Anyways it just stopped happening eventually and i hope it does the same for you! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Yeah, i haven't played since last weekends ARURF, and the client did some patching when i logged in just now. Noticed instantly that callapsing my friend-groups didn't seem to be a heavy and problematic task for my computer anymore. The black-out bug seems to be fixed. Thanks Riot. GGWP.

This is an issue we've received a few reports on and currently investigating further.   A [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) can serve as a current workaround.  I know this has been stressful, but this should do the trick!  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EnBVtix5,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-02-25T16:49:38.356+0000)
>
> This is an issue we've received a few reports on and currently investigating further.   A [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) can serve as a current workaround.  I know this has been stressful, but this should do the trick!  Let me know if you have any questions!

I still have the same problem after uninstalling.. :(
Same here i'm really annoyed because of it and i have a good pc tho :(
At least I know Im not alone :/
im getting this as well .Hope there's a fix soon.
